author: Donald Earl Collins
title: America isn't just a failing state, it is a failed experiment
description: And the mishandling of the coronavirus pandemic is just another proof.
content: Sometime in the future, maybe two or three centuries from now, when historians and other social scientists begin to write the first books about the failures of the defunct American experiment, they will all confront a basic truth: That despite American procla… [+9579 chars]
